title: Kelli Pang
text:
Education
I am a fourth-year student at the George Washington University, studying business with concentrations in business analytics and marketing, and a minor in journalism and mass communications.


Professional Experience
I have been an ad operations intern at Industry Dive since June 2022. Previously, I worked at the Sports and Fitness Industry Association as a marketing and communications intern.

title: About
text: This website is my final project for SMPA3230, Reporting in the Digital Age.

title: Portfolio
text:
Who let the dogs out?

A look at how daily dog park outings created a friend group during the COVID-19 pandemic lockdown.

5 things you should know about monkeypox

A listicle sharing different facts and statistics about the 2022 monkeypox outbreak.

What the shell?: Where did all the oysters go?

A science narrative showcasing the role of eastern oysters in the Chesapeake Bay and my relationship with the species.
